metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: C++ is a cross-platform language that can be used to create high-performance applications.
content.html: C++ is a cross-platform language that can be used to create high-performance applications.

content.text: C++ was developed by Bjarne Stroustrup, as an extension to the C language .
content.html: C++ was developed by Bjarne Stroustrup, as an extension to the C language.

content.text: C++ gives programmers a high level of control over system resources and memory.
content.html: C++ gives programmers a high level of control over system resources and memory.

content.text: The language was updated 5 major times in 2011, 2014, 2017, 2020, and 2023 to C++11, C++14, C++17, C++20, and C++23.
content.html: The language was updated 5 major times in 2011, 2014, 2017, 2020, and 2023 to C++11, C++14, C++17, C++20, and C++23.

content.text: C++ is one of the world's most popular programming languages.
content.html: C++ is one of the world's most popular programming languages.

content.text: C++ can be found in today's operating systems, Graphical User Interfaces, and embedded systems.
content.html: C++ can be found in today's operating systems, Graphical User Interfaces, and embedded systems.

content.text: C++ is an object-oriented programming language which gives a clear structure to programs and allows code to be reused, lowering development costs.
content.html: C++ is an object-oriented programming language which gives a clear structure to programs and allows code to be reused, lowering development costs.

content.text: C++ is portable and can be used to develop applications that can be adapted to multiple platforms.
content.html: C++ is portable and can be used to develop applications that can be adapted to multiple platforms.

content.text: C++ is fun and easy to learn!
content.html: C++ is fun and easy to learn!

content.text: As C++ is close to C , C# and Java , it makes it easy for programmers to switch to C++ or vice versa.
content.html: As C++ is close to C, C# and Java, it makes it easy for programmers to switch to C++ or vice versa.

content.text: C++ was developed as an extension of C , and both languages have almost the same syntax.
content.html: C++ was developed as an extension of C, and both languages have almost the same syntax.

content.text: The main difference between C and C++ is that C++ supports classes and objects, while C does not.
content.html: The main difference between C and C++ is that C++ supports classes and objects, while C does not.

content.text: When you are finished with this tutorial, you will be able to write C++ programs and create real-life examples.
content.html: When you are finished with this tutorial, you will be able to write C++ programs and create real-life examples.

content.text: It is not necessary to have any prior programming experience.
content.html: It is not necessary to have any prior programming experience.
